body.p:
Columbia Ky June 1st 1861
Hon B Magoffin
Saml. Gill
Geo T Wood
Gen Peter Dudley
Doct Jno B Peyton --

On this day a company of House Guards was organized under the Act approved 24th May 1861. I was elected Captain -- and report 63 privates -- together with the officers provided for under our State Military laws -- The number will in a few days be increased to 100 -- who will be sworn in as provided for when added to the company. I enclose the certificate of the County Judge & my bond with the secruity required under the law; and desire to draw Rifled muskets if now to be had for the company. -- Can the arms now be furnished? If so I will send immediately for them.

Adair County Home Gd
1861
4
Adair Coy
-- Home guard --
T E Bramlette
Captain --
Granted
